query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes WHERE projectId = 1) as total_clientes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes WHERE projectId = 1 AND produtoPrincipal IS NOT NULL) as clientes_enriquecidos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mercados_unicos WHERE projectId = 1) as total_mercados,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concorrentes WHERE projectId = 1) as total_concorrentes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leads WHERE projectId = 1) as total_leads;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4LxBqKfHv1LE9mk.f65588d6698e --database XpSHcSiEisTmX38X46V9tQ --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes WHERE projectId = 1) as total_clientes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes WHERE projectId = 1 AND produtoPrincipal IS NOT NULL) as clientes_enriquecidos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mercados_unicos WHERE projectId = 1) as total_mercados,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concorrentes WHERE projectId = 1) as total_concorrentes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leads WHERE projectId = 1) as total_leads;
